title: What I have to prepare or do for future as my first year classes of University for BTech electrical branch not started yet due to covid-19 pandemic and getting delayed further? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is the best time for up skilling. Learn computers, MS office, word processing, Statistical software, accounting siftware, photoshop. Learn CAD essentials. You can also try to learn French or German online. There are hundreds of free online courses in several areas. Read self improvement books by well known authors. Learn English grammar and editing skills. Time wasted will not come back.
